## About Notion
Notion revolutionizes how individuals and teams organize information by providing a flexible all-in-one workspace that adapts to any workflow. The platform replaces multiple disconnected tools with a unified system where users can create documents, manage projects, build knowledge bases, and collaborate seamlessly. Notion's block-based architecture allows for endless customization, enabling users to design workspaces that perfectly match their specific needs and preferences.

The desktop application delivers a optimized experience for both macOS and Windows users, offering offline access, faster performance, and deep system integration. Whether used for personal note-taking, team project management, or company-wide knowledge sharing, Notion scales from individual use to enterprise deployment while maintaining its intuitive interface and powerful functionality across all devices and platforms.

## âš™ï¸ System Requirements

**For macOS:**
*   macOS 10.14 Mojave or later
*   64-bit processor
*   4 GB RAM (8 GB recommended)
*   500 MB of available storage space

**For Windows:**
*   Windows 10 (64-bit) or later
*   4 GB RAM (8 GB recommended)
*   DirectX 11 compatible graphics card
*   500 MB of available storage space
